name: Ghost Hunter (Kracoz)
description:
CONTROLS

[WASD or Arrows] To Move

[HOLD SPACEBAR] To kill enemies

[Esc] To Reset Level + Quit Game

GAME INFO

If you go left you feed the bigger ghost to feed the bigger ghost you'll need to kill a smaller ghost on the right. Once you have fed the Boss ghost 20x it will then spawn in and the only way you can kill him is with your health, do be aware if you're not counting the game doesn't tell you as it makes the game more fun as you'll have to hope you have enough health to fight him. If you die the game resets once you've won you will get a surprise :)!

HOW TO DOWNLOAD

Once you've clicked the download button you need to un compress the file and click on the thing named Ghost Hunter no need to open any files!

INFORMATION

This game is my 2nd ever game and my 1st 2D game if you liked it please do let me know and if you didn't tell me where I could improve. There is many bugs as this game was made within 3 days for a Game Jam so I could test what I've learnt from my 1st Game. I will be releasing a video on how I made the game on my YouTube after I remodel it with a new logo. If you want to subscribe now and wait for the video the link will be at the bottom of the description, thanks!
